answerText: Kepesh [or David Kepesh][10] This uncreatively named character visits John Demjanjuk's trial in Israel in Operation Shylock, infuriates his lover by publicizing notes about their conversations in Deception, and narrates The Plot Against America.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Editors 3 | 18 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name these Philip Roth recurring characters, for 10 points each. [10] This sex‚Äêobsessed literature instructor is the protagonist of The Professor of Desire, The Breast, and The Dying Animal. His adventures include turning into a giant breast and failing in his attempt to secure a meaningful relationship with Consuela Castillo.
